# Ankr Redefines Blockchain Scalability with Rollup-as-a-Service for zkSync
Hyperchains

* * *

BlockchainWeb3

Dec, 05, 2023

2 min read

by BlockchainReporter

In a groundbreaking move for the blockchain industry, Ankr, a leading
infrastructure solution in the Web3 space, has unveiled Rollup-as-a-Service
(RaaS) support for zkSync Hyperchains built with the innovative ZK Stack. This
development introduces a transformative solution for enterprises and
developers eager to harness the unique benefits of zero-knowledge rollups for
their decentralized applications.

ZK Stack, a free and open-source modular framework designed for constructing
sovereign zero-knowledge (ZK)-powered chains, forms the backbone of this
revolutionary initiative. Ankr’s RaaS enables the swift customization and
deployment of independent hyperchains, providing an end-to-end engineering and
infrastructure solution. This offering stands out as the fastest and most
comprehensive solution available in the market, allowing clients to tap into
the unparalleled scaling and security advantages of zero-knowledge rollups.

## Scaling the Future of Blockchain

Ankr’s RaaS empowers clients to establish an independent ZK Stack-enabled
layer 2 blockchain exclusively tailored to serve transactions from their
specific use case. Currently, Ankr supports the deployment of ZK hyperchains
in a testnet environment, with close collaboration with Matter Labs, a
software development and cryptography company specializing in zkSync.

Kev Silk, Senior Product Manager at Ankr, emphasized the potential of ZK Stack
hyperchains, stating, “Hyperchains from ZK Stack have the potential to become
one of the most powerful rollup options available for developers. The
distinctive scalability and security features, in addition to the seamless
customization and deployment from Ankr’s Rollup as a Service, will make
hyperchains an important evolution for the layer 2 space as a whole.”

Marco Cora, SVP of Business and Operations at Matter Labs, said, “Ankr stands
out as one of the great infrastructure solutions in Web3, powering some of the
most renowned businesses in blockchain. Having Ankr’s Rollup-as-a-Service live
and integrated for developers to deploy hyperchains with ZK Stack is a
significant milestone. Ankr’s  Rollup-as-a-Service will reduce development
time for projects and enterprises looking to deploy hyperchains and allow
teams to focus on their unique use cases enabled through ZK Stack while
simultaneously speeding up time to market.”

Ankr’s RaaS extends its existing Scaling Services suite, offering developers
the ability to launch custom sidechains on various blockchain ecosystems. This
new addition caters to the industry’s growing demand for highly scalable
projects, ensuring they can benefit from Ethereum’s robust security and token
model.

Ankr, known as an all-in-one Web3 developer hub, facilitates the building of
Web3 apps with high-performance connections to over 40 blockchains. Recognized
as an approved infrastructure partner for dedicated sidechains and L2 rollups
on ecosystems like zkSync, Optimism, BNB Smart Chain, Polygon, and Avalanche,
Ankr simplifies blockchain development by creating tailored solutions that
include validators, RPC nodes, block explorers, testnets, staking platforms,
and more.

In essence, Ankr’s Rollup-as-a-Service support for ZK Stack Hyperchains marks
a significant leap forward in the world of blockchain development, offering
developers and enterprises an unprecedented combination of scalability,
security, and customization for their decentralized applications. As the
industry continues to evolve, Ankr’s commitment to providing cutting-edge
infrastructure solutions positions it as a key player in shaping the future of
Web3.

Read the article at BlockchainReporter ****
